recent_signals.headline: Healthcare Employment Monoculture: 95% of Jan 2026 net job creation (137K of 143K) — one sector masking structural weakness everywhere
recent_signals.source: BLS (Feb 7, 2026)

recent_signals.headline: Triple frontier AI launch: Claude Opus 4.6 + GPT-5.3-Codex + Gemini 3 all released Feb 5 — unprecedented simultaneous frontier release
recent_signals.source: TechCrunch, Bloomberg (Feb 5, 2026)

recent_signals.headline: Chinese AI Spring: 5 labs at near-frontier simultaneously (GLM-5, MiniMax M2.2, Doubao 2.0, Qwen 3.5, Kimi K2.5) — ecosystem self-sustaining
recent_signals.source: Digital Applied (Feb 2026)

recent_signals.headline: BLS 898K revision (1.7M cumulative overstatement) — largest since 2009. 2024 economy materially weaker than reported
recent_signals.source: BLS (Feb 2026)

recent_signals.headline: Securities inverse Baumol: wages DECLINING (-2.4%) while employment GROWS (+4.1%) at highest Baumol (3.71x) — AI restructures cost per head downward
recent_signals.source: QCEW data analysis, v3-7 deep dive

recent_signals.headline: H-1B wage-weighted lottery effective Feb 27 — binary event for IT services labor supply. 55% self-selection expected
recent_signals.source: USCIS (Feb 2026)

recent_signals.headline: DeepSeek V4 imminent (~Feb 17) with Engram conditional memory + 50% cost reduction — open-source parity measured in days
recent_signals.source: Motley Fool, Gigazine (Feb 11, 2026)

recent_signals.headline: Management sector is economy's overhead: 2.55M workers, $375B payroll, 55% routine-cognitive. Gartner: 20% of orgs cutting >50% middle management by 2026
recent_signals.source: Gartner, QCEW, v3-7 deep dive

recent_signals.headline: GPT-4 equivalent inference at $0.40/M tokens with 50x annual decline rate — sub-$0.10 by mid-2026
recent_signals.source: Hyperscaler pricing APIs, Goldman Sachs AI capex research

recent_signals.headline: $936B-$1.8T PE refinancing wall maturing 2026-2028 — distress catalyst for Schumpeterian replacement
recent_signals.source: Moody's leveraged finance, S&P LCD default rate tracker

recent_signals.headline: Financial Services cascade accelerating: 54% customer interactions automated, 87% AI fraud detection, 339 branch closures
recent_signals.source: BDO 2026 Predictions, McKinsey Banking Trends, FDIC BankFind Suite

recent_signals.headline: Staffing industry stocks RHI -53%, MAN -44%, KELYA -25% — 3.57M employees and $192.7B wages in Schumpeterian cascade
recent_signals.source: RHI, MAN, KELYA stock data, BLS NAICS 5613 employment

recent_signals.headline: Coasean shrinkage at 532K new business applications/month sustained through 4-year rate cycle — structural micro-firm shift
recent_signals.source: Census Bureau Business Applications, BLS staffing industry data

recent_signals.headline: Healthcare AI adoption 3% to 22% in 2 years, 66% physician usage, 295 FDA AI clearances in 2025 alone
recent_signals.source: IntuitionLabs Hospital Adoption, FDA AI/ML device database, PMC/NIH surveys

recent_signals.headline: 73K cobots shipped 2025 (+31% YoY), $2.26B Q1 2026 robotics funding — 74-point implementation gap in manufacturing
recent_signals.source: IFR World Robotics 2025, PitchBook robotics funding Q1 2026

recent_signals.headline: Silver Tsunami: 2.34M businesses owned by 55+ with 58% no succession plan — largest business transfer event in US history
recent_signals.source: Census Bureau Survey of Business Owners, SCORE succession surveys

recent_signals.headline: DeepSeek R1 trained for ~$6M claiming o1 parity — Chinese LLM global share surged 3% to 13% in 2 months
recent_signals.source: PIIE 2026, CSIS analysis, MIT Technology Review

recent_signals.headline: Baumol stored energy reaches $207B — professional services wage growth +4%/yr vs CPI 2.5%, gap widening annually
recent_signals.source: BLS Occupational Employment Statistics, BLS CPI data

recent_signals.headline: Manufacturing AI implementation gap: 98% exploring / 20% production-ready = 78-point gap, $34B to $155B market by 2030
recent_signals.source: Deloitte 2026 Manufacturing Outlook, Vention 2025 survey

recent_signals.headline: Global AI ecosystem bifurcation: US subscription model vs China free-access, Gulf emerging as third compute node
recent_signals.source: RAND report, CSIS analysis, Atlantic Council 2026

recent_signals.headline: Grid interconnection bottleneck: 2,600 GW in 5+ year queues (2x US installed base) — binding constraint on AI scaling
recent_signals.source: FERC interconnection queue data, Lawrence Berkeley National Lab

recent_signals.headline: Professional pipeline collapse: CPA candidates -33%, nursing 78K vacancies projected to 200K by 2030, 42 states teacher shortages
recent_signals.source: AICPA Pipeline Report, BLS Occupational Outlook, National Council of State Boards of Nursing

recent_signals.headline: Global defense spending $2,718B (+9.4% real), steepest rise since Cold War; NATO targeting 5% GDP by 2035
recent_signals.source: SIPRI Apr 2025, NATO official, Atlantic Council NATO tracker

recent_signals.headline: AI adoption plateau at 46% for 12 months — psychology ceiling, not technology limitation; 54% non-adopters = $200B+ market
recent_signals.source: McKinsey Global AI Survey 2025, Census Bureau AI adoption supplement

recent_signals.headline: 25-40% of Google code AI-generated, Copilot 41% acceptance rate — software labor cost curve bending structurally
recent_signals.source: Google CEO earnings call, GitHub Copilot statistics

recent_signals.headline: Gulf SWFs committing $100B+ to AI infrastructure: Saudi Humain $77B, UAE MGX $25B — oil-to-AI wealth conversion
recent_signals.source: Bloomberg, CNN Business, CNBC, CSIS

recent_signals.headline: Healthcare AI trust gap: providers 7/10 vs patients 3.6/10 — 34-point gap defines back-office-first adoption pathway
recent_signals.source: Pew Research AI in Healthcare 2025, JAMA AI trust studies

recent_signals.headline: Fear-driven demand creates ~$86B market by 2030: AI governance $15.8B + safety $9.8B + cybersecurity $60.6B
recent_signals.source: MarketsandMarkets, Grand View Research, Fortune Business Insights
